description: Ultimate Windows Tweaker is a freeware Tweak UI Utility for tweaking and optimizing Windows 11.
notes: - It is always recommended to create a system restore point before tweaking your system, and hence an easily accessible button for creating the same has been provided in the tweaker. The publisher or the author assumes no liability for damages, direct or consequential, which may result from the use of this freeware.
- Do visit its home page at <https://www.thewindowsclub.com/ultimate-windows-tweaker-5-for-windows-11> for more details.
